amendment.description: Amendment sought to include language stating that outdated air quality standards would not apply toward a preconstruction permit if the applicable federal, state, or local permitting agency determines that applying it would likely increase air pollution, slow permitting, or increase regulatory uncertainty.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 113-626 to state that outdated air quality standards do not apply toward a preconstruction permit if the applicable federal, state, or local permitting agency determines that applying it would likely increase air pollution, slow permitting, or increase regulatory uncertainty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 225 (Roll no. 529).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 225 (Roll no. 529).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Waxman.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
